item.description:
Hi All,

Let's climb! I am pretending to be Susan this Friday. :)

Please note, you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You should also take a class at Metrorock if you have never climbed before. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements. The gym also has a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car.

Hope to see some of you then,
Lopa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the gal at the picnic table in black pants and a green shirt. I will wait till 7:15 pm and if you arrive after you will have to come find me. :)
item.why: Because Because Because of the wonderful things it does ....
item.name: Suddenly Susan
